name: 3D Brick Breaker Revolution 2
summary: Unleash epic destruction over infinite levels of unbelievable 3D brick breaking action! Get blown away by up to 31 insane power ups – including Smart Bomb, Shockwave, Vanish, Multiball & more! Battle the new super boss CHE 2.0 & fight to survive insane secret bonus levels & epic boss battles! 3 game modes - Revolution, Classic & Time Attack- deliver endless excitement, you deliver the revolution!
